1.0.name: wordpress/bitly-linker
1.0.description:
Bit.ly linker is a WordPress plugin that will automatically create bit.ly links for each post that you publish. You can specify Google tracking code so that the bit.ly link is automatically tracked in Google Analytics.

URL: http://isitablog.co.uk/bitly_linker
